column1: Beechbone was a notably tall and handsome Ent.  On 3 March  he was caught in a burning spray sent up by Saruman from the beneath the Ring of Isengard
column2: but his fiery end brought his fellow Ents to the peak of their destructive anger.

column1: 2002: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers:
:An unnamed Ent survives being set alight by extinguishing the flames in the floods of the River Isen.
Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings
